entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
